summary: This release brings a refreshed look and smarter tools to Grove. We've evolved our branding with a new, simpler leaf icon and introduced Vibe Mode, a natural language search to help you find the perfect custom domain. Under the hood, we've made important upgrades for better stability and compatibility, ensuring your blog platform runs smoothly as it grows.

features: implement Linktree-style icon with single path (#78)
mature leaf design into sapling SVG (#75)
add Vibe Mode for natural language domain search (#74)
fixes: Svelte 5 compatibility and SvelteKit route fixes
